name: part_000
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ重大発表】3DLIVE！！重大発表！！【湊あくあ⧸ホロライブ】 [0kGVDYAKcGc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Wait screen for the 3D Live stream with background music playing. The screen displays '重大発表 3DLIVE' (Major Announcement 3DLIVE) and a countdown/teaser atmosphere.
Minato Aqua appears on a 3D stage and performs the song 'Dada Dada Tenshi'.

subtitles.original: 重大発表 3DLIVE
subtitles.english: Major Announcement 3DLIVE

subtitles.original: やんない、じゃない、できないんだ。どや！
subtitles.english: It's not that I won't, it's that I can't. So there!

subtitles.original:
ダダダダ天使
作詞・作曲：ナユタン星人
subtitles.english:
Dada Dada Tenshi
Lyrics & Composition: Nayutalien

subtitles.original: バカばっかり！地元でうわさのダメ天使
subtitles.english: Just idiots! The no-good angel famous in the neighborhood

subtitles.original: ダメの子守唄　シノバパワーで補ってく
subtitles.english: Lullaby for a no-good kid, making up for it with Shinova power

subtitles.original: のよ。天使さ！
subtitles.english: That's me. An angel!

subtitles.original: できないの　もっともっとあなたに気に入ってほしい
subtitles.english: I can't do it, I want you to like me more and more

subtitles.original: 退屈で　腐りすぎたら　ビビる　コミュニケーション
subtitles.english: If I get too bored and rotten, I get scared of communication

subtitles.original: 天使のリングの停電は　切れかけてるけど
subtitles.english: The power outage of my angel ring is about to go out

subtitles.original: 見方を変えれば　これもう愛、愛、愛、愛さ！
subtitles.english: If you change your perspective, it's already love, love, love, love!

subtitles.original: なんて強がった　本当は曖昧な愛の感情も
subtitles.english: Acting tough like that, even my truly ambiguous feelings of love

subtitles.original: あなたと探したいの
subtitles.english: I want to search for them with you

subtitles.original: ねえ　ダメダメダメダメな私を　愛してね
subtitles.english: Hey, please love me, the no-good, no-good, no-good me

subtitles.original: 大概の賞賛は　右から左へ受け流してさ！
subtitles.english: Just let most of the praise pass from right to left!

subtitles.original: ドキドキドキドキをあげるよ　あなたには
subtitles.english: I'll give you heart-pounding, heart-pounding excitement

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見ててくれるなら　だむ、だむ、だむ
subtitles.english: If you're watching me properly, damu, damu, damu

subtitles.original: ダダダダダメ天使！　ダダダダダメですか？
subtitles.english: Dada Dada no-good angel! Dada Dada, is it no good?

subtitles.original: だけど、もう私はいいか！　やんない、じゃない、できないんだ。どや！
subtitles.english: But well, I'm fine already! It's not that I won't, it's that I can't. So there!

subtitles.original: テストでいい点とりたい！　でも頭がちっとも追いつかない
subtitles.english: I want to get a good score on the test! But my brain doesn't keep up at all

subtitles.original: 日曜日だって早起きしたい！　深夜のネトゲがやめられない
subtitles.english: I want to wake up early even on Sundays! I can't stop playing online games late at night

subtitles.original: やる気がないとかそんなんじゃなくて　やる気があってもできない性
subtitles.english: It's not that I don't have motivation, it's that even if I do, I'm the type who can't do it

subtitles.original: しょうがないな、って許してよ　エンジェルリング　放り投げて
subtitles.english: Forgive me, saying 'it can't be helped'. Throwing away my angel ring

subtitles.original: 天使の翼は使ってない　飛ぶの怖いから
subtitles.english: I don't use my angel wings because I'm afraid of flying

subtitles.original: 本気も出したら飛べますが？　みたいな顔しているんだ
subtitles.english: I'm making a face that says, 'I could fly if I really tried, you know?'
